R

refreshAnswers() - Method in class org.zelvator.editor.QuestionEditation
This method reinitializes JList with answers, updates the list according values in question object
refreshAnswers() - Method in class org.zelvator.tester.Tester
This method is used for updating JList, where only one answer is correct.
refreshListOfQuestions() - Method in class org.zelvator.editor.QuestionSelection
This method reinitializes JList with questions, updates the list according values in xml file and set up Filter for filtering existing questions.
refreshListofTests() - Method in class org.zelvator.editor.TestEditation
This method reinitializes JList with tests, updates the list according files found in the folder and displays only name without prefix.
refreshMultipleAnswers() - Method in class org.zelvator.tester.Tester
This method will update and refresh JList with answers, for this particular method is needed to make possible to select multiple answers.
removeNodeInQuestionNode(Node, String) - Method in class org.zelvator.file.ModifyXMLFile
This method will remove all occurrences of child node in the question node.
result() - Method in class org.zelvator.tester.Tester
This method will redirect you to the AnswerReaction to see result.
